â€¢ Try to do three sets of 
eight squeezes every day. 
To help you remember, 
you could do them once at 
each meal.
As well as these exercises, 
you will also need to practise 
tightening	up	the	pelvic	floor	
before and during coughing 
and sneezing.
Ask your midwife or doctor 
about these exercises. Your 
local maternity unit should 
run classes where a specialist 
physiotherapist attends. They
